Corporation for Excellence in Public Education 公共教育优秀团体（代号）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"超过，胜过"之意。
means: surpass ： 多用以强调优点、长处、技能或质量等方面的超过。
excel ： 指在成绩、成就或学识上胜过他人。
exceed ： 既可指超出权利、权力的限度、管辖范围，或超过规定的时间范围，又可指在数量、程度或大小等方面的超过。

sentence.Network_cn: 他开始在学术上超越他人。

sentence.Network_en: If your talent combines with diligence, you can excel in your pursuit.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你把天赋与勤奋结合起来, 你所追求的事业便会出类拔萃.

sentence.Network_en: How can I read a Microsoft Excel file on a computer that only has Works installed?
sentence.Network_cn: 我怎样在只安装了Works软件的电脑上读取微软的Excel文件呢？

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin excellere, from ex- 'out, beyond' + celsus 'lofty'

entry.def: If someone excels in something or excels at it, they are very good at doing it.

example.ex: Caine has always been an actor who excels in irony...
example.tran: 凯恩向来是个擅长讽刺的演员。

example.ex: Mary was a better rider than either of them and she excelled at outdoor sports...
example.tran: 玛丽的骑术比他们俩都要好，而且她擅长户外运动。

auth_sentence.content: JIRC has the intention to excel in inflammation research.
auth_sentence.res_content: JIRC has the intention to excel in inflammation research.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: JIRC has the intention to excel in inflammation research.

auth_sentence.content: Excellent computer software skill especially MS Excel and Powerpoint.
auth_sentence.res_content: Excellent computer software skill especially MS Excel and Powerpoint.

auth_sentence.content: Their passion motivates them to practice and eventually excel.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优秀, 卓越, 优点, 美德
stems_affixes.word_buile: excel[v.优秀, 胜过他人]+ence性质→excellence优秀, 卓越
ex出+cel高超,优越→超出优越→优秀

sentences.cn: 他是一个出色的演说家。

sentences.en: He excels all other composers of his period.
sentences.cn: 他胜过同时代的所有其他作曲家。
